tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE luxury_real_estate_security (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    client_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    client_email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    client_phone VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    property_address VARCHAR(150) NOT NULL,
    financial_data JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_id INT REFERENCES clients(client_id),
    property_id INT REFERENCES properties(property_id),
    transaction_date DATE,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL(16, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE clients (
    client_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    client_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    client_email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE,
    client_phone VARCHAR(20),
    client_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE properties (
    property_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    property_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    property_type VARCHAR(100),
    property_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    property_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    client_id UUID REFERENCES clients(client_id),
    property_id UUID REFERENCES properties(property_id)
);

CREATE TABLE employees (
    employee_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    employee_email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE,
    employee_role VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    employee_salary DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE clients (
    client_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_name VARCHAR(255),
    client_email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE,
    client_phone VARCHAR(20),
    client_address VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE properties (
    property_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    property_name VARCHAR(255),
    property_address VARCHAR(255),
    property_type VARCHAR(50),
    property_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    agent_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    property_id INT,
    client_id INT,
    agent_id INT,
    transaction_date DATE,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE security_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT,
    action_performed VARCHAR(50),
    details TEXT
);
